message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $8500 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that 12000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for 11000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $11000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $9500. Let's make this happen!

I understand that 11000 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for 10800. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, but I think it's still a great deal for you!
